Paul Pierce

Paul Anthony Pierce

(The Truth, P-Double)

Position: Small Forward and Shooting Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-7, 235lb (201cm, 106kg)

Born: October 13, 1977 in Oakland, California us

College: Kansas

High School: Inglewood in Inglewood, California

Draft: Boston Celtics, 1st round (10th pick, 10th overall), 1998 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: February 5, 1999

Hall of Fame: Inducted as Player in 2021 (Full List)

Career Length: 19 years

  • Hall of Fame
  • 10x All Star
  • 2008 NBA Champ
  • 4x All-NBA
  • 1998-99 All-Rookie
  • 2007-08 Finals MVP
  • NBA 75th Anniv. Team

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Paul Pierce?

Paul Pierce is 47 years old.

Where was Paul Pierce born?

Paul Pierce was born in Oakland, California.

When was Paul Pierce born?

Paul Pierce was born on October 13, 1977.

How tall is Paul Pierce?

Paul Pierce is 6-7 (201 cm) tall.

How much did Paul Pierce weigh when playing?

Paul Pierce weighed 235 lbs (106 kg) when playing.

Is Paul Pierce in the Hall of Fame?

Paul Pierce was inducted to the Hall of Fame as a Player in 2021 (Full List) .

When was Paul Pierce drafted?

Paul Pierce was drafted by Boston Celtics, 1st round (10th pick, 10th overall), 1998 NBA Draft.

What position did Paul Pierce play?

Small Forward and Shooting Guard.

When did Paul Pierce retire?

Paul Pierce last played in 2017.

What is Paul Pierce's net worth?

Paul Pierce made at least $198,120,632 playing professional basketball.

How much did Paul Pierce make?

Paul Pierce made $19,795,712 in 2010.

What did Paul Pierce average?

Paul Pierce averaged 19.7 points, 5.6 rebounds, and 3.5 assists per game.

How many rings does Paul Pierce have?

Paul Pierce won one championship.

What is Paul Pierce's Twitter account?

Paul Pierce is on Twitter at paulpierce34.

What schools did Paul Pierce attend?

Paul Pierce attended Inglewood in Inglewood, California and Kansas.

What are Paul Pierce's nicknames?

The Truth, P-Double are nicknames for Paul Pierce.
